channel.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
channel.description: How do i make it so when new people come on the server they get 99 on slayer. cuz its not working ;)

item.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:13, topic:324165”][quote author=Kingen50cent link=topic=420563.msg3089363#msg3089363 date=1262749023]
Thanks.
I saw this code in the bottom of my client.java

if (timeOutCounter++ > 20/* && logoutButton*/) { misc.println("Disconnected "+playerName+", Data transfer timeout."); disconnected = true; return false; }

i think i should change the “20” to like “1” right?
[/quote]

That code disconnects a player if he/she is inactive for 20 seconds.[/quote]lmao if he changes it to 1.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so when they start they get 99

item.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:12, topic:324165”]Thanks.
I saw this code in the bottom of my client.java

if (timeOutCounter++ > 20/* && logoutButton*/) { misc.println("Disconnected "+playerName+", Data transfer timeout."); disconnected = true; return false; }

i think i should change the “20” to like “1” right?[/quote]

That code disconnects a player if he/she is inactive for 20 seconds.

Read full topic

I saw this code in the bottom of my client.java

i think i should change the “20” to like “1” right?

item.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:9, topic:324165”]Ok i’m having a problem.
My server auto-restarts every 35 minutes
And sometimes when it restarts some people lose their stuff when they log back in.
Is there a way to fix this? like adding a bot saying “10 minutes remaining untill restart LOG OUT!”
or something.

Kk. and from now on i will try to fix my small problems.(the one above is not a small one lol)[/quote]
What Owned said.
Normally they save every 500ms.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so when they start they get 99

item.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:9, topic:324165”]Ok i’m having a problem.
My server auto-restarts every 35 minutes
And sometimes when it restarts some people lose their stuff when they log back in.
Is there a way to fix this? like adding a bot saying “10 minutes remaining untill restart LOG OUT!”
or something.

Kk. and from now on i will try to fix my small problems.(the one above is not a small one lol)[/quote]

You could make it so your server saves the characters more often.

item.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:7, topic:324165”]Well i guess it’s against the rules to ask for help.
Oh does it look like im the only one asking for help?
that philip guy made over 4 threads in only 30 minutes…and no one blames him.
ah.[/quote]

No, you should just try to try things on your own before straight away going for help and asking to be spoon-fed.

Don’t compare yourself to this phillip kid. Let him go ask for help, he’ll become dependent from it, and won’t be able to actually make his own updates, just the help we give him.

Trying to help you out, if you ever want to be a successful programmer, that is.

If not, keep on asking people for help for every small little thing. You’ll see that in life it’s a lot different.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so when they start they get 99
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:5, topic:324165”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=420563.msg3089317#msg3089317 date=1262747160]

You would call this in the Player constructor:

playerLevel[IDOFSLAYER] = 99; playerXP[IDOFSLAYER] = 14000000;

So much for you being an experienced RSPS programmer.

Win.
[/quote]
You people really like to insult newbies.
Imagine you guys being a guy with no knowledge!
What would you have done if someone did this to you.[/quote]

When I started RSPS programming, I hardly asked for help, seriously.

Read full topic
